nodes.text: Slokin was a male ambassador and collector of ancient treasures, possessing a vast repository within his estate. According to legend, Slokin purchased a mask from the Ithorian collector Dok-Ondar, and was granted visions of its original owner's exploits and manipulations. Slokin followed the actions of the mask wearer, gaining power for himself, but was eventually killed by his advisor, Potniss, who had become tired of assisting Slokin and wished to possess his collection for himself.
